channel.title: Npc code help?
channel.description: alright, I'm running a 517 server, and was wondering.. I've seen servers that have npc's walking around.. I was wondering if anyone could teach me how to let npcs walk around? give me a little snippet or something... I was wondering if this had anything to do with it.. [code]spawn = #### XXXX YYYY H 0 0 0 0 0 Npc Name :o[/code] I was wondering if the zeros had anything to do with it.. like the first zero being one x coord and the second zero being a y coord and the 3rd zero being a 2nd x and 4th zero being a 2nd y ... idk, I was wondering how you would make the npc's walk around.. :)

item.title: Npc code help?
item.dc:creator: @gamerbug gamerbug
item.description:
@gamerbug wrote:

alright, I’m running a 517 server, and was wondering… I’ve seen servers that have npc’s walking around… I was wondering if anyone could teach me how to let npcs walk around? give me a little snippet or something… I was wondering if this had anything to do with it…

spawn	=	####	XXXX	YYYY	H	0	0	0	0	0	Npc Name :o

I was wondering if the zeros had anything to do with it… like the first zero being one x coord and the second zero being a y coord and the 3rd zero being a 2nd x and 4th zero being a 2nd y … idk, I was wondering how you would make the npc’s walk around…

Read full topic
